sentences.sentence: He stomped out of the room in high dudgeon.
sentences.translation: 他愤怒地噔噔走出了屋子。

sentences.sentence: Washington businesses are in high dudgeon over the plan.
sentences.translation: 华盛顿的企业对这项计划非常不满。

sentences.sentence: United can confirm that Joe Dudgeon has completed his proposed move to Hull City.
sentences.translation: 曼联确认乔。道金完成了到赫尔城的转会。
